scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run copy:files
scripts.copy:files: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(!fs.existsSync('public')){fs.mkdirSync('public',{recursive:true})}; const copyDir=(src,dest)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(dest)){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true})}; fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(item=>{const srcPath=path.join(src,item); const destPath=path.join(dest,item); if(fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath)}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath)}})}; ['*.html','assets','css','js','dist','robots.txt','sitemap.xml','.htaccess'].forEach(pattern=>{if(pattern.includes('*')){fs.readdirSync('.').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.html')).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(f,path.join('public',f)))}else if(fs.existsSync(pattern)){if(fs.statSync(pattern).isDirectory()){copyDir(pattern,path.join('public',pattern))}else{fs.copyFileSync(pattern,path.join('public',pattern))}}})"
scripts.optimize:html: node -e "console.log('HTML optimization placeholder - implement minification if needed')"
scripts.validate: node -e "console.log('Validation placeholder - implement HTML/CSS validation if needed')"
